1-Microwave-pretend-hash.title: AI Microwave
1-Microwave-pretend-hash.description: An #AI #Microwave would know what to #cook without you having to ask.

2-Door-pretend-hash.title: Opening Door
2-Door-pretend-hash.description: An #AI #Microwave would automatically open the door for you.

3-Temp-pretend-hash.title: Temp
3-Temp-pretend-hash.description: An #AI #Microwave would know what temp to cook your food at.

4-Time-pretend-hash.title: Time
4-Time-pretend-hash.description: An #AI #Microwave would know how long to cook your food.
